targets.alias: Uncheckpointed Bytes NOTE: innodb_checkpoint_age is obtained by 'show engine innodb status', this is currently not implemented in Telegraf
Max Checkpoint Age NOTE: innodb_checkpoint_max_age is obtained by 'show engine innodb status', this is currently not implemented in Telegraf
InnoDB Transactions NOTE: innodb_max_trx_id is obtained by 'show engine innodb status', this is currently not implemented in Telegraf
History Length NOTE: innodb_history_list_length is obtained by 'show engine innodb status', this is currently not implemented in Telegraf

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("lock_row_lock_time"), 1s)/non_negative_derivative(max("lock_row_lock_waits"), 1s) FROM "mysql_innodb" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s)

seriesOverrides.alias: Total Size of InnoDB Log Files

targets.query: SELECT difference(last("os_log_bytes_written")) FROM "mysql_innodb" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h)

targets.alias: Total Size of InnoDB Log Files
Allocated NOTE: ibuf_segment_size is obtained via "show engine innodb status" command, this is currently not collected by Telegraf
Allocated NOTE: ibuf_segment_size and ibuf_free_list are obtained via "show engine innodb status" command, this is currently not collected by Telegraf

list.label: Host
list.name: Host
list.query: show tag values on "telegraf" from "mysql" with key = "host"
